Package gdi.game.dominion

Class BaseGame

java.lang.Object
gdi.game.dominion.BaseGame
public class BaseGame extends Object
This class provides the framework for a small game of Dominion. It handles everything necessary to provide drawing and user input processing. The main game logic for Dominion is outsourced to the assigned DominionInterface.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Sven Huprich, Vanessa Klein
